verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה׀ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Now these [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <S%H4082><s%> ham-me-di-Nah, of the province הָֽעֹלִים֙ <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Lim that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> mish-she-Vi out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah, of those which had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הֶגְלָ֛ה <S%H1540><s%> heg-Lah had carried away; נְבוּכַדְנֶצֹּור ne-vu-chad-netz-tzor כנְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <S%H5020><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar Nebuchadnezzar קמֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon לְבָבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> le-va-Vel; unto Babylon וַיָּשׁ֛וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu and came again לִירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> li-ru-sha-Lim unto Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah and Judah אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H5892><s%> le-'i-Ro. unto his city

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- These בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u Which came עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel, with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua נְ֠חֶמְיָה <S%H5166><s%> Ne-chem-yah Nehemiah שְׂרָיָ֨ה <S%H8304><s%> se-ra-Yah Seraiah רְֽעֵלָיָ֜ה <S%H7480><s%> re-'e-la-Yah Reelaiah מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <S%H4782><s%> ma-re-do-Chai Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <S%H1114><s%> bil-Shan Bilshan מִסְפָּ֥ר <S%H4558><s%> mis-Par Mispar בִּגְוַ֖י <S%H902><s%> big-Vai Bigvai רְח֣וּם <S%H7348><s%> re-Chum Rehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <S%H1196><s%> ba-'a-Nah; Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei of the men עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <S%H6551><s%> far-'Osh, of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah an hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Yah, of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children אָרַ֔ח <S%H733><s%> 'a-Rach, of Arah שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah and five וְשִׁבְעִֽים׃ <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im. seventy ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- The children פַחַ֥ת fa-Chat מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H6355><s%> mo-'Av of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ye-Shu-a' of Jeshua יוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av; [and] Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam, of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children זַתּ֔וּא <S%H2240><s%> zat-Tu, of Zattu תְּשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> te-Sha' nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children זַכָּ֔י <S%H2140><s%> zak-Kai, of Zaccai שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְשִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H8346><s%> ve-shish-Shim. and threescore ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children בָנִ֔י <S%H1137><s%> va-Ni, of Bani שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children עַזְגָּ֔ד <S%H5803><s%> 'az-Gad, of Azgad אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim. two ס sa-Mek
